description: Uses MeqTrees to simulate a sky model (Gaussians and point sources) into measurement set (MS)

parameters.info: MS to simulate sky model into
parameters.name: msname

parameters.info: TDL configuration file. If not specified, will use a default template
parameters.name: tdlconf

parameters.info: save final configuration (after all command-line arguments have been applied)
parameters.name: save-config

parameters.info: Number of CPUs to use for  multithreading
parameters.name: threads

parameters.info: Chunk size in timebins
parameters.name: tile-size

parameters.info: Section to execute in TDL config file. Only needed if using custom TDL config
parameters.name: section

parameters.info: Simulation mode. You can; i) 'simulate' - replace; ii) 'add' to; iii) or 'subtract' from the data in the specified column
parameters.name: mode

parameters.info: Size of tile (time bins) to process. Can be used to reduce memory footprint
parameters.name: tile-size

parameters.info: Sky model to be simulated
parameters.name: skymodel

parameters.info: Recenter the sky model to this direction
parameters.name: field-center

parameters.info: Recenter skymodel to phase center of MS
parameters.name: recenter

parameters.info: Enable time and bandwidth smearing in simulation
parameters.name: smearing

parameters.info: Add noise to simulated data
parameters.name: addnoise

parameters.info: Noise to be added to the simulated data will be derived from this value (~sefd/sqrt(dt*dv))
parameters.name: sefd

parameters.info: Enable direction independent corruptions to simulated data
parameters.name: Gjones

parameters.info: Field ID
parameters.name: field-id

parameters.info: SPW ID
parameters.name: spw-id

parameters.info: Noise to add to visibility data. In Jy
parameters.name: noise

parameters.info: Column name
parameters.name: column

parameters.info: Input column. Needed for 'mode' = 'add, subtract'.
parameters.name: input-column

parameters.info: Maximum period for direction independent gain corruption. In hours
parameters.name: gain-max-period

parameters.info: Minimum period for direction independent gain corruption. In hours
parameters.name: gain-min-period

parameters.info: Maximum period for direction independent gain corruption. In deg
parameters.name: gain-max-error

parameters.info: Minimum period for direction independent gain corruption. In deg
parameters.name: gain-min-error

parameters.info: Maximum period for direction independent gain corruption. In hours
parameters.name: phase-max-period

parameters.info: Minimum period for direction independent gain corruption. In hours
parameters.name: phase-min-period

parameters.info: Maximum period for direction independent gain corruption. In deg
parameters.name: phase-max-error

parameters.info: Minimum period for direction independent gain corruption. In deg
parameters.name: phase-min-error

parameters.info: Add a primary beam model
parameters.name: Ejones

parameters.info: Beam files pattern
parameters.name: beam-files-pattern

parameters.info: Type of input beam files
parameters.name: beam-type

parameters.info: Beam l axis
parameters.name: beam-l-axis

parameters.info: Beam m axis
parameters.name: beam-m-axis

parameters.info: Enable parallactic angle rotation. Enable if telescope mount is ALT-AZ
parameters.name: parallactic-angle-rotation

parameters.info: Pointing accuracy in arcsec. If set to non-zero value, will introduce pointing errors into simulation
parameters.name: pointing-accuracy
